data.description:
Choose your Hibow hero and be the last one standing on the future bow fight battlefield!
Features:
-Realistic arrow fight in the air. 
The ultra-smooth VR arrow simulation guaranteed by development over 3 years, together with the muscle memory flight movement system, will give you a unique VR experience like no other.
-Battle of wits
Choose your hero and use different skill and trait combinations for different battle situations.
The fast-paced gameplay with silky smooth flight movements allows you to react quickly and take the right strategic option, giving you complete control in every dogfight. 
-Diverse weapon and gear upgrade options  
Choose from a wide selection of bows and arrows, including sniper bows and scattered, explosive and blinding arrows. Continue to upgrade your gear and gain an edge on the battlefield by your wisdom.
-Diverse game modes with constant creative updates
Hibow never goes stale with a steady stream of new contents such as heroes, maps, game modes, weapons and seasonal leagues.
 
Need Help? 
contact us through Discord, mail, or simply leave comment, wheather for support or feedback, we are always happy to answer.

Follow Us:
Discord: https://discord.gg/hibow
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/HibowVR

changelog.change_log:
Exciting news for the upcoming Hibow version 0.9.4.2! 

New Features:
1. Get ready for a spooky Halloween ghost-catching event! Plus, our new Lobby is decked out with Halloween decorations to get you into the festive spirit! 
2. In the Lobby, you'll now find a shiny new mirror! Check out your style before heading into the action. 
3. The Lobby now features a fresh, multiplayer training area! 

Bug Fixes:
We've squashed quite a few bugs:
1. Fixed the issue where the player list toggle didn't work in the drop pod.
2. Corrected the arrow drop issue with the electric rapid fire bow.
3. Arrows should now be properly blocked by shields.
4. The Guardian's grenade launcher's pre-aim line rotation problem is no more.
5. Counting problems with some achievements have been fixed.
6. Addressed map discrepancies between the mini-map and actual locations in Wasteland Quarry.
7. The zipline problem in Seafarer's Haven has been resolved.
8. Experience display issue in the post-match screen after an upgrade is sorted out.
9. No more walking sound effects when rotating the camera without moving.
10. Fixed the rank display on the leaderboard.
11. Issues with entering a username during account creation are resolved.
12. Corrected incorrect images in the tutorial.

Optimizations:
Several optimizations have been made, including:
1. Airdrop crates will no longer contain only melee weapons.
2. The endless melee skill effect when using adrenaline has been removed.
3. Improved UI for match rooms and arcade mode rooms.
4. Optimized player movement under network synchronization.
5. Now, you'll be reminded when drawing your bow if you're out of arrows. 

Work in Progress:
We're not stopping here! What's on the horizon:
1. Thumper is coming out of the posters to join the game as a hero with powerful displacement skills!
2. Stay connected with a Recent Companions system. Easily find players you've recently teamed up with in the friend interface.
3. For better community engagement and player interaction, an in-client reporting system is in the works.
4. We're planning a new tutorial that combines the Lobby with tutorial maps, featuring additional practice mini-games to enhance your skills. 

Hibow is leveling up, and we're excited to have you along for the adventure!

New Features:
● Friend Invitation Rewards: Introducing a feature for inviting friends and receiving rewards.
● Room List UI Update and Enhanced Newbie UI Guidance: We've updated the user interface for room lists and improved the guidance for new players.
● Newbie Guide Announcements: Added announcements for new player guidance. These announcements will only appear for players who haven't reached level 10 yet.
● Tutorial Images: Introduced tutorial images to certain interfaces.
Optimizations:
● Addressed Low Probability Crash Issue: We have resolved a rare crash problem that some players were experiencing. This issue has been fixed.
● Improved Flight Movement Smoothness: Enhancements have been made to ensure smoother flight movements.
● Linked Stun Effect of Electric Shock Bow to Charging: The stun effect of the Electric Shock Bow is now correlated with its charging level.
● Optimized Friend Server Presentation: The display of friend servers has been improved.
● Store Shows Contents of Daily Chests: The store now provides information about the items that can be obtained from daily chests.
● Lobby Collider Range Adjustment: The lobby's collider range has been adjusted, allowing for a larger flying area.
● Balance Adjustments:
a. Reduced Guardian‘s Crossbow damage to 15.
b. Increased Guardian's healing by 50%.
Bug Fixes:
● Friend List Levels in Rooms Were Disabled: Fixed the issue where friend levels were not displayed in room lists.
● Lobby Background Music Control: Lobby background music can now be muted via the settings page.
● Electric Stun Bow Not Functioning: Addressed the issue where the Electric Shock Bow was not working.
● UI Display Issues Resolved: Fixed various UI display problems.
Other Improvements:
● Added New Skins to the Store.
● Introduced Limited Skins in Store Packages.
● Added a Gold Purchase Option in the Store.

Dear Hibow Players,

We are excited to announce that Hibow version 0.9.4.1 is officially live! This update brings you an even more thrilling and immersive gaming experience. Let's take a sneak peek at the highlights of the upcoming update!

● Brand-New User Interface and Enhanced Interaction
In version 0.9.4.1, we've undergone a complete UI upgrade, presenting a fresh game interface layout and design for a smoother and more intuitive experience. We've also optimized the interaction process, making it easier for you to master the game.
● Exciting New Maps
○ Brand-New Lobby:
We've updated the lobby to give it a more futuristic feel!
○ Battle Royale Test Map - Abandoned Mine:
We're thrilled to introduce the brand-new Battle Royale test map, where you can engage in intense battles within the abandoned mine and compete for victory. Are you ready for this new challenge?
○ Deathmatch Maps - Tech Nexus Arena (Day and Night), Golden Glory Arena, Luminous Crystal Arena:
In the new Deathmatch maps, you'll experience different challenge atmospheres in various arenas, both day and night. With diverse settings, you'll face more strategic choices and showcase your archery skills.
● Store Now Open
We've now opened the store feature, where you can discover new character and bow skin options to personalize your hero and showcase your unique style!
● Achievements and Milestones
Get ready for a series of new challenges! We've designed dozens of unique achievement challenges. Completing these challenges will earn you milestone points for lucrative rewards!
● Titles
By achieving certain milestones, you can earn unique titles! Equip these titles to showcase your extraordinary skills!
● Arcade Mode
Here, you can participate in various new gameplay modes, including 1v1 battles, gunrun, and timed challenges, among others. Every day offers different experiences, so don't miss out!
● Match Features
We've introduced an entirely new match system for Hibow, allowing you to reserve, join, or even spectate matches. Stay tuned for our upcoming organized matches to hone your skills and compete for glory!
● Official Room System
We now have four preset official rooms for you to enjoy to the fullest.
● Daily Gift
Visit the store to claim your daily rewards. Don't miss out on the daily treasures! The advanced daily gift has a chance to contain rare skins!
● Zipline Functionality
We've added ziplines to the Battle Royale map, providing you with another fast way to traverse the terrain. Make good use of the ziplines to catch your opponents off guard!

Optimizations include:
● Reoptimized resource distribution for all maps.
● Melee weapons have been fine-tuned, making non-hero weapons distinct from hero-exclusive ones.
● New player guidance: If you're playing Hibow for the first time, we offer a brand-new UI guide to help you get started quickly.
● Enhanced AI for robots, offering more challenging opponents.
● Game loading speed optimization, allowing you to enter the lobby faster.
● Room creation process optimization for quicker room setup.
● Improved sniper bow aiming experience, making it easier to snipe opponents.
● Seasonal leaderboard adjustments; you can now see your seasonal ranking directly in the UI, give kudos to top players, and even send friend requests.

Thank you for your support, making Hibow even more exciting!

Hi, archers! This is the patch note for the 0.9.1 update focusing on improving the game experience and multiplayer social experience. 

Mini-Games
● Added mini-games in Lobby
● Shooting the target on the gate will randomly start one of the 3 mini-game modes 
● Each mode has its own global leaderboard

Discord Playmates Finder
● You can click the button with Discord logo in the customized room to use the discord playmates finder
● Your room information will be sent to a certain channel of Hibow's Discord server with a unique link, and other players can respond by clicking the link
● You can join Hibow's Discord server by discord.hibow.fun

Bonus Time
● There will be 3 hours of bonus time on Friday, Saturday and Sunday every week
● Completing the game within the bonus time will increase the gold coins and experience gained by 50%
● If you are a supporter, you will get 250% gold coins and experience if you complete the game within the bonus time
● Each server has a different bonus time, please check the instructions in the game

UI
● Part of the UI has been reworked, art effects have been optimized, and some bugs have been fixed

Map
● Fixed the gaps between models
● Optimized rendering to improve frame rate and fluency
● Optimized the setting of resource points
● A new demo map has been added. This map is limited to supporters. You need to get the supporter edition to experience it

Others
● Fixed some known issues
    ○ Sometimes the bow cannot be picked up or upgraded
    ○ The player information panel cannot be opened after reaching the full level
● Added a gliding switch, you can choose whether to enable gliding in the setting interface in the lobby or in the game
● Fighting against AIs woule be more difficult if you have a higher rank
● The AIs have new profile photos!

Thank you for your continued support! If you have any comment or suggestion to tell us, or you want to find some playmates, you are welcome to join Hibow's Discord server: discord.hibow.fun!
